choices: She decides to snack on some Toads...
She has some gas to unleash, and a princess to sit on...
1.content: The sound of heels clacking against the floor was evident through the remains of Princes Shroob's ship, having been stranded in the Mushroom Kingdom once more, and an itch for vengeance running through her veins. But how would she start off her little crusade?
1.title: Bow to the future queen

choices: It makes her grow 10 times her size!
It gives her a hellish amount of poisonous gas
It makes her feet grow tenfold... And boy do they reek!
They're so addicting she can't stop eating!
11.content:
Princess Peach, ruler of the mushroom kingdom along with a handful of well known heroes manage to thwart Princess Shroob's last Machiavellian scheme! This might have been their biggest mistake yet! As, like most evil, she's only waiting in the shadows for her time to get back in the spotlight, stronger than ever! And princess Shroob wastes no time getting back on track, she's currently too weak to go for a full frontal assault, but she knows just the way to not only gain strength but also make sure to give the Princess of the Mushroom kingdom a taste of her own medicine! How many Shroobs were defeated in her last plot to conquer the kingdom? Too much to count. It's only fair that she gets the chance to lower the population of Toads!

And lucky her, she's feeling especially hungry...

She struck at night time, where toads still roaming the streets were usually on their own, or in groups of 2 or 3, groups that she could easily dispose off in a few gulps! She sneaked toward the nearest village, as silent as an alien princess wearing hills could be. The first toad she laid her eyes on was sleeping against a tree, a telescope not too far from him, probably fell asleep while stargazing, lucky for him, space came to him tonight!

Not one to pass on a free meal, the alien princess creeps her way closer to the sleeping toad, and when she was close enough she turned around and lifted her dress, exposing her full moon to the sleeping astronomer. She then took pity on the sleeping toad, poor fellow is about to get swallowed whole by the booty of a goddess and he won't even get to see it!

"Wake up weakling!"
suddenly orders Princess Shroob, the Toad getting shaked awake, facing a massive purple ass, gleefully swaying left and right, the toad couldn't settle on if this was a dream of a nightmare.

"You get the priviledge of being Princess Shroobs first meal for the night! And utimately becoming pudge on my perfect body!"

Before he could protest however the princess simply swings her ass backward, violently colliding aginst th tree and burring the poor toad between her two purple mounds of shroob ass, her warm musk making him cough and wheeze as she clenches her cheeks, causing the toad to sink deeper inside the shroob's ass, another clench and resulting squelch later the toad was already waist deep in the princess's hungry butt, only his shoes remained out of her doughy derriere, but one clench later and that was taken care off, the toad finding himself stuffed in the princess' belly which expanded accordingly to the amount of food she just gulped down.

"Mmhmm...~ Delicious... Oh if I had better self-control I could stuff myself at one! Oh I bet 2 or 10 more will do the trick!~"

Her next victims were a cute and young couple, enjoying a calm and romantic ballad under the moonshine, sneaking into the under wood for some quality smooching, before any of that action could take place however the Shroob got her hand on them, lifting them of the ground by their collar causing the love birds to scream at the top of their lungs.

"Well well well~ Two delicious toads for the price of one...~" chirps the alien, lapping her slimy tongue against her lips as the two mushroom people tried to trash free from her grasp. "Y-you won't get away with this! The princess will get word of this!" says the guy, trying to sound intimidating, which only got a cackle out of the princess.

"What a big mouth you have...~ But saddly for you... Mine is a lot bigger!~" as so show off her point, the princess oepen her maw as wide as possible, lines of hot purple saliva seeping out of her mouth as her equally as warm breath washed over the poor guy, the smell of halitosis laced in the reek of poison mushroom made him sick to his stomach... Which only became a lot worst as she easily stuff his head inside her mouth, her long tongues caressing the toads cheeks, enjoying the taste of the terrified mushroom... Licking his face and covering it in sour smelling slobber before swallowing, reeling the toad halfway into her maw, she let him try to struggle free for a bit as she relishes in the flavor of his body, another audible gulp later and the toad was nothing more than an overside bulge rapidly moving down the princess throat before joining the other toad in her enormous belly. The gal was sobbing audibly, trying to bargain with the alien for her not to eat her, her cries for mercy didn't do more than her boyfriend's threats. "Fufufu...~ Don't you worry you miserable insect!~ I'll make you you 2 stay together for a long time! I'm sure you'll enjoy being an extra layer of pudge on my ass!~"

With no fancy tasting or other warning she rapidly stuffs the girl into of warm mouth and swallows her whole, her belly now home of 3 whole toads... But she still had room for more! She kept eating and eating until a dozen of toads were squirming inside her tummy... Now filled she settled on a relaxing clearing to lay down and digest her last meal... little did she know eating so many toads had... Interesting effects...
11.title: Mushroom buffet

choices: Rush the castle! Poot on princess! There's no time to waste!
She tries out her abilities on a smaller village first
Use Shroob technology to give her stench a few extra perks!
Tests her other stinks on more of her grunts
12.content:
Ever since her ship crashed once again in the mushroom kingdom poor old Princess Shroob didn't immediatly find the strength to go out and show the mushroom a ruler worthy of it name. Actually she has been coping with her last defeat by locking herself in her room and finding comfort in pretty much all the junk food she could get her hands on, and when you have a litteral army doing your bidding it means that stash of greasy comfort food was seemingly endless! That unhealthy diet made her gain a handful of pounds that's for sur, but lucky for all of that excess fat was stored in her bountiful booty.

Still, there was something food couldn't fix, and that was her dire need for revenge! While all that jnk food widdened her hips and fattened her juicy ass, it also came with an unexpected benefit... It made her gas reek to hell and back. She didn't think much of it at first... Until one of her minion, carrying another plate of greasy delicacy opened the door of her room to be greeted by a thick purple fog washing over him, the cloud of royal flatus carrying a stench like any other, the smell of unwashed ass laced in the vile miasma of a dumpster filled with junk food forgotten under the hot summer sun knocked him out in an instant, then it hit her! If her stench can make a Shroob pass out, surely it'll put a princess as sweet as Peach through hell!

Her spirit reignited, the gassy princess quickly jumped into her dress, tearing a bit at the seams from all that newly aquired junk she has in her trunk, there she was! Ready to give the pink Princess a big old whiff of Shroob gas!
12.title: She has some gas to unleash, and a princess to ...

info.brief_description: Princess Shroob is out to take the mushroom kingdom, but may use some rather odd methods..
info.description:
Similar to my previous Wendy story, Princess Shroob is out to take over the mushroom kingdom, go nuts!

Things not allowed: Offensive speech/actions, scat, watersports, vomit, graphic gore.
